swallows.title: Pounded Yam
swallows.description: Pounded yam, a smooth and stretchy Nigerian swallow, perfect with hearty traditional soups.

swallows.title: Eba
swallows.description: Eba, a classic Nigerian swallow made from garri, best enjoyed with a variety of rich soups.

swallows.title: Starch
swallows.description: Starch, a sticky Delta delicacy made from cassava, best enjoyed with rich palm nut or banga soup.

swallows.title: Amala
swallows.description: Amala, a traditional Yoruba swallow made from yam flour, perfect with flavorful soups like ewedu and gbegiri.

swallows.title: Fufu
swallows.description: Fufu, a soft and stretchy swallow made from fermented cassava, ideal for dipping into a variety of rich Nigerian soups.

swallows.title: Semovita
swallows.description: Semovita, a smooth and easy-to-prepare swallow made from semolina, perfect for pairing with a variety of Nigerian soups.

rice.title: Jollof Rice
rice.description: Smoky party-style jollof rice with rich flavors.

rice.title: Rice & Sauce
rice.description: Steamed white rice served with rich stew sauce and choice of protein.

rice.title: Coconut rice
rice.description: Steamed coconut rice served choice of protein.

rice.title: Fried rice
rice.description: A flavorful rice dish stir-fried with vegetables, spices, and seasonings, often served with proteins.

rice.title: Banga rice
rice.description: A rich and flavorful rice dish cooked with palm nut extract and traditional spices.

local-snacks.title: Masa & Stew
local-snacks.description: Perfectly seasoned masa served with rich tomato stew.

local-snacks.title: Puff Puff
local-snacks.description: Fluffy fried dough balls sprinkled with sugar.

pastry.title: Meat Pie
pastry.description: Flaky golden pastry stuffed with seasoned beef and vegetables.

pastry.title: Sugar Doughnut
pastry.description: Soft fried donut coated in sugar crystals.

pastry.title: Sausage Roll
pastry.description: Buttery pastry wrapped around savory sausage filling.

pastry.title: Cake
pastry.description: Rich and moist cake with creamy frosting.

pastry.title: Buns
pastry.description: Buttery pastry wrapped around savory sausage filling.

pasta.title: Spaghetti Jollof
pasta.description: Deliciously seasoned jollof spaghetti cooked in rich tomato sauce.

pasta.title: Spaghetti and stew
pasta.description: Tender spaghetti served with rich, flavorful stew.

pasta.title: Alfredo Pasta
pasta.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce tossed with tender pasta.

drinks.title: kunu Drink
drinks.description: A smooth, refreshing millet-based drink with a light, natural sweetness.

drinks.title: Ginger Drink
drinks.description: A zesty, refreshing drink with a spicy ginger kick.

drinks.title: Tigernut-drink
drinks.description: Creamy, naturally sweet drink made from tiger nuts.

drinks.title: Fruit Punch
drinks.description: Refreshing blend of mixed fruit flavors served chilled.

soups.title: Egusi Soup
soups.description: A rich melon seed soup cooked with vegetables and spices.

soups.title: Ogbono Soup
soups.description: Thick and hearty soup made from ground ogbono seeds.

soups.title: Bitterleaf Soup | Ofe onugbu
soups.description: A flavorful soup made with bitterleaf and assorted protine.

soups.title: Vegetable Soup
soups.description: A nutritious soup made with a variety of leafy greens and vegetables.

soups.title: Okra Soup
soups.description: A slimy and delicious soup made with fresh okra and spices.

soups.title: Afang Soup
soups.description: A rich and flavorful soup made with afang leaves and assorted meats.
